languages.text: "Ну что вы, почтенный магос. Союз Дома Орселлио и династии фон Валанциус — великое событие. Беспокоятся о нем лишь завистники, а друзья — дарят поддержку".
"Come now, esteemed Magos, the union of House Orsellio and the von Valancius dynasty is a grand occasion. Any who share their 'concerns' are merely envious — true friends give their support."
languages.original_text: "Ну что вы, почтенный магос. Союз Дома Орселлио и династии фон Валанциус — великое событие. Беспокоятся о нем лишь завистники, а друзья — дарят поддержку".

traits.locale_text: "Come now, esteemed Magos, the union of House Orsellio and the von Valancius dynasty is a grand occasion. Any who share their 'concerns' are merely envious — true friends give their support."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Come now, esteemed Magos, the union of House Orsellio and the von Valancius dynasty is a grand occasion. Any who share their 'concerns' are merely envious — true friends give their support."

traits.locale_text: "Come now, esteemed Magos, the union of House Orsellio and the von Valancius dynasty is a grand occasion. Any who share their 'concerns' are merely envious — true friends give their support."

traits.locale_text: "Come now, esteemed Magos, the union of House Orsellio and the von Valancius dynasty is a grand occasion. Any who share their 'concerns' are merely envious — true friends give their support."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “不必担心，尊敬的贤者，奥赛罗家族与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的联合将会是场辉煌的盛典。任何对此表示‘忧虑’的人都只是嫉妒罢了，真正的朋友只会送上诚挚的祝福。”
languages.original_text: "Come now, esteemed Magos, the union of House Orsellio and the von Valancius dynasty is a grand occasion. Any who share their 'concerns' are merely envious — true friends give their support."

traits.locale_text: “不必担心，尊敬的贤者，奥塞罗家族与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的联合将会是场辉煌的盛典。任何对此表示‘忧虑’的人都只是嫉妒罢了，真正的朋友只会送上诚挚的祝福。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Allons, honorable magos, l'union de la maison Orsellio et de la dynastie von Valancius est un événement grandiose. Dans une situation pareille, il n'y a que les envieux pour émettre des inquiétudes. Les véritables amis, eux, doivent faire preuve d'un soutien inconditionnel. »
languages.original_text: "Come now, esteemed Magos, the union of House Orsellio and the von Valancius dynasty is a grand occasion. Any who share their 'concerns' are merely envious — true friends give their support."

traits.locale_text: « Allons, honorable magos, l'union de la maison Orsellio et de la dynastie von Valancius est un événement grandiose. Dans une situation pareille, il n'y a que les envieux pour émettre des inquiétudes. Les véritables amis, eux, doivent faire preuve d'un soutien inconditionnel. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Vamos, estimado Magos, la unión de la casa Orsellio y la dinastía von Valancius es motivo de celebración. Quien hable de sus "preocupaciones" tan solo tiene envidia. Nuestros verdaderos amigos apoyan este matrimonio».
languages.original_text: "Come now, esteemed Magos, the union of House Orsellio and the von Valancius dynasty is a grand occasion. Any who share their 'concerns' are merely envious — true friends give their support."

traits.locale_text: «Vamos, estimado Magos, la unión de la casa Orsellio y la dinastía von Valancius es motivo de celebración. Quien hable de sus "preocupaciones" tan solo tiene envidia. Nuestros verdaderos amigos apoyan este matrimonio».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「さあ、尊敬するマゴス、オルセリオ家とフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の結びつきは壮大なものです。”心配事”を共有する者は、単にうらやましいだけ。真の友人たちが支えてくれます」
languages.original_text: "Come now, esteemed Magos, the union of House Orsellio and the von Valancius dynasty is a grand occasion. Any who share their 'concerns' are merely envious — true friends give their support."

traits.locale_text: 「さあ、尊敬するマゴス、オルセリオ家とフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の結びつきは壮大なものです。”心配事”を共有する者は、単にうらやましいだけ。真の友人たちが支えてくれます」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bitte Euch, verehrter Magos, die Vereinigung zwischen Haus Orsellio und der Dynastie von Valancius ist ein monumentales Ereignis. Jeder, der seine 'Sorgen' mitteilt, ist schlicht eifersüchtig. Wahre Freunde schenken dem Paar ihre Unterstützung."
languages.original_text: "Come now, esteemed Magos, the union of House Orsellio and the von Valancius dynasty is a grand occasion. Any who share their 'concerns' are merely envious — true friends give their support."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte Euch, verehrter Magos, die Vereinigung zwischen Haus Orsellio und der Dynastie von Valancius ist ein monumentales Ereignis. Jeder, der seine 'Sorgen' mitteilt, ist schlicht eifersüchtig. Wahre Freunde schenken dem Paar ihre Unterstützung."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Come now, esteemed Magos, the union of House Orsellio and the von Valancius dynasty is a grand occasion. Any who share their 'concerns' are merely envious — true friends give their support."

languages.text: "İstirham ederim sevgili Magos. Orsellio ve von Valancius hanedanlıklarının birleşimi, muazzam bir hadise. Tüm bu "kaygıların" çıkış noktasının kıskançlık olduğu aşikâr. Sahici dostlar destek olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Come now, esteemed Magos, the union of House Orsellio and the von Valancius dynasty is a grand occasion. Any who share their 'concerns' are merely envious — true friends give their support."

traits.locale_text: "İstirham ederim sevgili Magos. Orsellio ve von Valancius hanedanlıklarının birleşimi, muazzam bir hadise. Tüm bu "kaygıların" çıkış noktasının kıskançlık olduğu aşikâr. Sahici dostlar destek olacaktır."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
